io.deepstream

Interface RpcRequestedListener


  • public interface RpcRequestedListener
    Listener for any rpc requests recieved from the server

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRPCRequested(java.lang.String rpcName, java.lang.Object data, RpcResponse response)
      This listener will be invoked whenever the client recieves an rpc request from the server, and will be able to respond via RpcResponse.send(Object) or RpcResponse.reject()

    • Method Detail

      • onRPCRequested

        void onRPCRequested(java.lang.String rpcName,
                  java.lang.Object data,
                  RpcResponse response)
        This listener will be invoked whenever the client recieves an rpc request from the server, and will be able to respond via RpcResponse.send(Object) or RpcResponse.reject()
        Parameters:
        rpcName - The name of the rpc being requested
        data - The data the request was made with
        response - The RpcResponse to respond to the request with
